notes:
OpenStreetMap exports for use in GIS applications.

This theme includes all OpenStreetMap features in this area matching:

waterway IS NOT NULL OR water IS NOT NULL OR natural IN ('water','wetland','bay')

Features may have these attributes:

- [name](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:name)
- [waterway](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:waterway)
- [covered](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:covered)
- [width](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:width)
- [depth](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:depth)
- [layer](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:layer)
- [blockage](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:blockage)
- [tunnel](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:tunnel)
- [natural](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:natural)
- [water](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:water)

This dataset is one of many [OpenStreetMap exports on
HDX](/dataset?tags=openstreetmap).
See the [Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team](http://hotosm.org/) website for more
information.
